nodes.text: This planet was an abandoned Sith world. It was orbited at some point by an Alpha facility.
During the Rise of the Empire era, the Trade Federation sent ships to investigate the planet.
This planet was created by Syd Mead for the 2010 book Star Wars Art: Visions. Mead took inspiration for his piece Abandoned Sith World from the film Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
